Home.title: A minimal Next.js + Cloudflare starter for serious product teams.
Home.subtitle: Build with the App Router, package with OpenNext, and deploy to Workers without extra glue. Ant Design v6 provides dependable components while Tailwind v4 handles layout and polish.

next.title: Next.js App Router
next.body: Modern routing and layouts with streaming-friendly defaults.

workers.title: Cloudflare Workers
workers.body: Edge deployment with fast cold starts and global reach.

opennext.title: OpenNext build
opennext.body: Transforms your Next.js output into a Worker runtime package.

Home.structureIntro: Keep everything in one place. Source lives in
Home.structureMiddle: configuration stays in the repo root, and OpenNext outputs to
Home.previewNote: Preview runs your build on the Cloudflare runtime before you deploy.
